name: .TNO
summary: Learn about .TNO files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

instructions: When you use the TI-Nspire Software to update your TI-Nspire's operating system, the software will ask you to select a handheld OS file. At that point, select your TNO file, and then click Install OS. The software will then install the updates your TNO file contains to your calculator.
